channel.title: Few important questions
channel.description:
Hello, I got few problems, if you guys can help me with it, it will be great!
- Where can I trusted buy a cheap VPS? And if I run one, I dont have to portforward?
- If I want to change characters, and go to the data, it gives only ''Media Player'' logs, and cant open them. How can I fix this?
Thanks in advance!

item.title: Few important questions
item.dc:creator: @Gillare Gillare
item.description:
@Gillare wrote:

Well, If I go to: Data > Games (Characters)

I see only files of Windows Media Player, and if I change the format open with Notepad, it gives no text or something, but weird codes…

Read full topic

item.title: Few important questions
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

I mean explain more…

Read full topic

item.title: Few important questions
item.dc:creator: @Gillare Gillare
item.description:
@Gillare wrote:

[quote=“joelandjacob, post:2, topic:453334”]Hello Gillare,
Buying a VPS is simple, and also setting it up. If you do buy one, the server is open to all ports, and is already portforwarded. If you do buy a vps, I recommend a Linux OS. Maybe CentOS or Ubuntu.

Thanks for the suggestions!

Best VPS host imho wooservers, cheap and worth your while.

as for the second question, you’re going to have to elaborate.

And how to elaborate them…?
Here’s a few suggestion sites.
http://www.myhosting.com
http://www.x10vps.com

Also, I’ve never heard of “Media Player” logs. Usually it’s just a Data > Characters > CharacterName.txt.

Try checking that out and respond.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.description:

Best VPS host imho wooservers, cheap and worth your while.

as for the second question, you’re going to have to elaborate.

item.title: Few important questions
item.dc:creator: @joelandjacob joelandjacob
item.description:
@joelandjacob wrote:

Hello Gillare,
Buying a VPS is simple, and also setting it up. If you do buy one, the server is open to all ports, and is already portforwarded. If you do buy a vps, I recommend a Linux OS. Maybe CentOS or Ubuntu.

Here’s a few suggestion sites.
http://www.myhosting.com
http://www.x10vps.com

Also, I’ve never heard of “Media Player” logs. Usually it’s just a Data > Characters > CharacterName.txt.

Try checking that out and respond.

Read full topic
